abstract: Susannah Meadows reviews books The Great Leader, by Jim Harrison, The Wandering Falcon, by Jamil Ahmad, The Outlaw Album, by Daniel Woodrell, The Night Strangers, by Chris Bohjalian, Ballistic, by Mark Greaney, and No More Mr Nice Guy, by Howard Jacobson.
snippet: New books by Jim Harrison, Mark Greaney, Jamil Ahmad, Daniel Woodrell, Chris Bohjalian and Howard Jacobson.
lead_paragraph: New books by Jim Harrison, Mark Greaney, Jamil Ahmad, Daniel Woodrell, Chris Bohjalian and Howard Jacobson.

headline.seo: New Books by Jim Harrison and Howard Jacobson
